charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F  On or about 4/23/10 and 4/26/10 defendant knowingly delivered 5 or more grams of a substance containing cocaine base (crack) in violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(B).

21:841A=ND.F  NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE.  On or about 4/23/10 defendant knowingly distributed 5 grams or more of a substance containing cocaine base (crack) in violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) and 18 USC 2.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the custody of the BOP for 360 months. Said term shall consist of 360 months on each of Counts 1 and 2, to run concurrently. Following release, defendant shall serve an 8 year term of supervised release with special conditions. Said term shall consist of 8 years on each of Counts 1 and 2, to run concurrently. $200 special assessment is imposed. 1/29/13 - RESENTENCING ON REMAND. It is the judgment of the Court the defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 200 months on Counts 1 and 2, to run concurrently. Following release from incarceration, the defendant shall serve a 6 year term of supervised release with special conditions. Said term shall consist of 6 years on each of Counts 1 and 2, to run concurrently. Defendant shall pay a $200 special assessment.

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a period of 188 months. Following release from custody, defendant shall serve a 4-year term of supervised release with special conditions. $100 special assessment is imposed. 1/10/2013 RE-SENTENCING pursuant to remand. Defendant committed to the custody of the BOP for 151 months. Following release from custody, defendant shall serve 3 year term of supervised release.
